question: Which of the following is the odd one out?

options.label: A
options.svg: <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle cx="50" cy="50" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/></svg>

options.label: B
options.svg: <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><rect x="25" y="25" width="50" height="50" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/></svg>

explanation: Options A, B, C, and D are all regular polygons (circle can be considered a polygon with infinite sides), while E is a diamond/rhombus which is an irregular quadrilateral.
